data.title: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them
data.author: Walt Disney

data.title: If you can dream it, then you can achieve it
data.author: Walt Disney

data.title: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams
data.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

data.title: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined
data.author: Henry David Thoreau

data.title: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.title: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.title: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears
data.author: Les Brown

data.title: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart
data.author: Roy T.Bennett.

data.title: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall
data.author: Confucius

data.title: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear
data.author: George Addair

data.title: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.title: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.title: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.title: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions
data.author: Stephen Covey

data.title: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.title: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all
data.author: Dale Carnegie

data.title: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn’t do than by the things you did
data.author: Mark Twain
